metadata.title: CVE-2023-52722 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Artifex Ghostscript through 10.01.0.psi/zmisc1.c, when SAFER mode is used, allows eexec seeds other than theType 1 standard.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52722` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.12
ghostscript-x - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.12
libgs9 - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.12
libgs9-common - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.12').
